amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision that permits financing entities to use funds repaid by participants to provide assistance to additional participants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-475 to strike the provision that permits financing entities to use funds repaid by participants to provide assistance to additional participants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 237 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Barton (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 237 (Roll no. 252).
